attributes.action: Fund and Train GPS/locums in the uk to perform ADHD assesments
attributes.additional_details: I dont want people to suffer for 50 years like I have. I recently got diagnosed with ADHD inattentive type and I fit the autistic spectrum. I have been telling GPS nurses psychiatrists for decades of my symptoms. nobody spotted it. Depression they all said. I've had at least 10 brands of anti depressants. a student CBT therapist who only a few months ago said she spotted the red flags in me. she used to work with children with ADHD in camms. Not enough space here for everything I have to say
attributes.background: Fund the training for GPS to be able to spot the red flag symptoms of ADHD. alert the relevent professionals to put patient on the right track. and give training & concent for GPS to perform adult adhd assesments. The private sector profits must be bulging at the seams.Time to take back control

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620084
